description.zh: Jirafeau 是一个开源的文件共享工具，允许用户上传文件并生成唯一的下载和删除链接。它通过 HTML5 支持大文件传输，提供上传进度追踪，并可选密码保护和加密功能。该项目强调简洁性，无需数据库，依赖项极少。
description.en: Jirafeau is an open-source file sharing solution that allows users to upload files and generate unique download and deletion links. It supports large file transfers through HTML5, provides progress tracking, and offers optional password protection and encryption. The project focuses on simplicity, requiring no database and minimal dependencies.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 简洁轻量的文件共享方案
- 无需数据库，系统依赖极少
- 遵循 KISS 原则（保持简单）
- 开源项目，拥有活跃社区和定期更新
- 内建安全性设计，支持加密和访问控制

## 功能列表:

- 单次上传生成一个下载链接和一个删除链接
- 通过 HTML5 支持大文件上传
- 上传进度显示，包括速度、百分比和剩余时间
- 支持浏览器内内容预览（如可能）
- 可选上传或下载密码保护
- 可配置下载链接过期时间
- 可设置首次下载后自动销毁
- 使用 base64 编码缩短 URL
- 可配置最大上传文件大小
- 支持多种语言界面
- 文件级去重以优化存储空间
- 可选服务器端数据加密
- 简洁的管理界面
- CLI 脚本用于自动清理过期文件
- 基础服务条款页面
- 文件去重节省存储空间
- 基础 API 接口支持集成
- Bash 脚本支持命令行上传
- 支持自定义主题
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Simple and lightweight file sharing solution
- No database required, minimal system dependencies
- Focuses on the KISS principle (Keep It Simple, Stupid)
- Open-source with active community and regular updates
- Secure by design with encryption and access control options

## Features:

- One upload generates one download link and one delete link
- Supports large file uploads via HTML5 file API
- Upload progress tracking with speed, percentage, and estimated time
- In-browser content preview (when possible)
- Optional password protection for upload or download
- Configurable expiration time for downloads
- Option to self-destruct after first download
- Shortened URLs using base64 encoding
- Configurable maximum upload size
- Language support for multiple locales
- File-level deduplication for storage optimization
- Optional server-side data encryption
- Small administration interface
- CLI script for automatic cleanup of expired files
- Basic Terms of Service page
- File deduplication to save storage space
- Basic API for integration
- Bash script for command-line file uploads
- Customizable themes
